# OROSTONE — Premium Sintered Stone Surfaces

> OROSTONE is a Slovak premium supplier of sintered stone (sinterovaný kameň) for kitchen countertops, bathroom vanities, wall cladding, and architectural projects. Based in Bratislava, Slovakia. We provide end-to-end service: expert consultation, digital laser templating (±0.05mm precision), CNC diamond fabrication, in-house A-frame transport, and certified professional installation. All projects completed in 10–15 working days.

## Key Facts

- Sintered stone is 100% mineral material sintered at 1,200°C without resins
- Withstands temperatures up to 300°C, UV radiation, acids, and scratches
- Near-zero porosity (under 0.1%) — stain-proof without sealing
- Available in 3mm (cladding), 12mm (standard), and 20mm (premium countertops)
- Mohs hardness 6–7, breaking force up to 16,000N for 20mm slabs
- Popular finishes: matte, polished, leather/textured

## Expert Blog Articles

- [Sintered Stone Problems Nobody Tells You](https://www.orostone.sk/#/blog/problemy-so-sinterovanym-kamenom): Comprehensive guide to chipping, cracking at cutouts, transport damage, and installation mistakes — with prevention techniques. Covers edge profiles (half-bullnose vs 90°), minimum 5mm corner radius for cutouts, two-pass cutting technique, and A-frame transport requirements.
- [Sintered Stone vs Quartz vs Ceramic vs Dekton](https://www.orostone.sk/#/blog/sinterovany-kamen-vs-kvarcit-vs-keramika-vs-dekton): Technical comparison of four premium countertop materials — composition, heat resistance, UV stability, price ranges, and decision tree for choosing the right material.
- [Matte vs Polished Surface: Which Looks More Luxurious?](https://www.orostone.sk/#/blog/matny-vs-leskly-povrch): Practical comparison of surface finishes — fingerprint visibility, micro-scratch behavior, photogenic qualities, and real-world recommendations for luxury kitchens.
- [From Measurement to Installation: The Orostone Process in 10 Steps](https://www.orostone.sk/#/blog/od-merania-po-instalaciu-proces-orostone): Complete walkthrough of the entire process — consultation, material selection, digital templating, CNC fabrication, quality control, transport, substrate preparation, installation, appliance fitting, and final inspection.
- [Is Sintered Stone Worth It? Price vs Lifespan vs Maintenance](https://www.orostone.sk/#/blog/oplati-sa-sinterovany-kamen): Financial analysis with 25-year total cost of ownership for three scenarios (family home, apartment, Airbnb) comparing sintered stone, quartz, granite, and laminate.

## Services

- Free no-obligation consultation and showroom visits
- Digital laser templating with ±0.05mm precision
- CNC diamond-tool fabrication (two-pass cutting standard)
- In-house transport in custom A-frame vehicles
- Professional installation by certified technicians
- Extended warranty and after-sales repair service

- Website: https://www.orostone.sk
- Location: Bratislava, Slovakia
- Languages: Slovak, English
